When <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H3766>bowed<s%> <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H7812>paid<s%> <S%H7812>homage<s%> to him, <S%H2001>Haman<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2534>rage.<s%>

But he <S%H959>disdained<s%> <S%H5869><s%> to <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> for they had <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H834>[who<s%>] the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> [were;] therefore <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> who [were] throughout the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H5212>Nisan,<s%> in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> <S%H6332>Pur,<s%> that is the <S%H1486>lot,<s%> was <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> and from <S%H2320>month<s%> [to <S%H2320>month<s%>] until the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that is the month <S%H143>Adar.<s%>

Then <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> <S%H3426>"There<s%> is a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6340>scattered<s%> and <S%H6504>dispersed<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of your <S%H4438>kingdom;<s%> their <S%H1881>laws<s%> are <S%H8132>different<s%> from [those] of <S%H3605>all<s%> [other] <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they do not <S%H6213>observe<s%> the king's <S%H1881>laws,<s%> so it is not in the king's <S%H9586>interest<s%> to let them <S%H5117>remain.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> it is <S%H2895>pleasing<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> let it be <S%H3789>decreed<s%> that they be destroyed, and I will <S%H6>pay<s%> <S%H8254>ten<s%> <S%H6235>thousand<s%> <S%H505>talents<s%> of <S%H3603>silver<s%> into the <S%H3701>hands<s%> of those who <S%H3027>carry<s%> on the [king's] <S%H6213>business,<s%> to <S%H4399>put<s%> into the king's <S%H935>treasuries.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5493>took<s%> his <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>ring<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9097>Hammedatha<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite,<s%> the <S%H6887>enemy<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> "The <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H5414>yours,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> [also,] to <S%H6213>do<s%> with them as you <S%H2896>please.<s%> <S%H5869><s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H9373>scribes<s%> were <S%H7121>summoned<s%> on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> and it was <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H3605>just<s%> <S%H834><s%> as <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to the king's <S%H323>satraps,<s%> to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H4082>each<s%> <S%H4082>province,<s%> and to the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5971>each<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4082>each<s%> <S%H4082>province<s%> according to its <S%H3791>script,<s%> <S%H5971>each<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> according to its <S%H3956>language,<s%> being <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of King <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> with the king's <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>ring.<s%>

And <S%H5612>letters<s%> were <S%H7971>sent<s%> by <S%H7323>couriers<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the king's <S%H4082>provinces<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy,<s%> to <S%H2026>kill,<s%> and to annihilate <S%H6>all<s%> the <S%H3605>Jews,<s%> <S%H3064>both<s%> <S%H4480>young<s%> and <S%H5288>old,<s%> <S%H2205>women<s%> and <S%H802>children,<s%> in <S%H2945>one<s%> <S%H259>day,<s%> the <S%H3117>thirteenth<s%> <S%H7969><s%> [day] of the <S%H6240>twelfth<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240>month,<s%> <S%H2320>which<s%> is the <S%H1931>month<s%> <S%H2320>Adar,<s%> and to <S%H143>seize<s%> their <S%H962>possessions<s%> as <S%H7998>plunder.<s%>

A <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H3791>edict<s%> to be <S%H5414>issued<s%> as <S%H1881>law<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4082>province<s%> was <S%H1540>published<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> so that they should be <S%H6264>ready<s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H7323>couriers<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H1765>impelled<s%> by the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>command<s%> while the <S%H1881>decree<s%> was <S%H5414>issued<s%> in <S%H7800>Susa<s%> the <S%H1002>capital;<s%> and while the king and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa<s%> was in <S%H943>confusion.<s%>
